name: Sea Urchin Eggs with Wakame
description:
Roe or hard roe is the fully ripe internal egg masses in the ovaries, or the released external egg masses of fish and certain marine animals, such as shrimp, scallop and sea urchins....

Wakame is a sea vegetable, or edible seaweed. It has a subtly sweet flavour and is most often served in soups and salads.

This product is a delicious and colourful mix of Sea urchin roe and Wakame make this not only a tasty dish but also a highly nutritious one.

The basic diet of Sea Urchin is large brown seaweed, rich in group B vitamins and minerals, calcium, protein, magnesium, potassium, phosphorus, iron, and niacin. 

This delicate combination of flavours works well mixed into pasta or rice, in a salad or as a filling for avocado, also as an accompaniment to white fish.

Ingredients: Sea urchin roe, wakame, water, sea salt
Weight: 80g

name: Sea Urchin Caviar
description: This exquisit culinary delicacy is made from the ovaries, called corals or roe, of the sea urchin. This ‘sea urchin caviar’ has been caught from local seas surrounding the beautiful village of Lastres in Asturias. Try the rich, fresh flavour and delicate texture on fresh bread or added to scrambled eggs and let the soft, buttery texture delightfully melt in your mouth! 90g

name: (Imitation) Baby Eels in Garlic Dressing
description: These slimy, pre-cooked imitation baby Eel pieces, are acually obtained from the flesh of the Alaskan Pollock, one of the world's most abundant fish food. Dare to eat these slithery, mini worm-like, garlic dressed pieces straight out of the tin or warm up and make into a delicious, tummy churning meal! Ingredients: Surimi (white fish proteins, water, rice starch, egg white, salt, flavours, stabilisers, cephalopod ink), vegetable oil, salt, garlic, chillis, gluten and soya derivatives. 120g

name: Giant Water Bug Chilli Paste
description:
This paste is HOT! 

Giant Water Bug Chilli Paste

Water Scorpions / Nepidae / Giant Bugs are consumed as a delicacy in Thailand. 
The bug has a unique flavour that is used to enhance the chilli paste. The paste is a condiment for sticky rice and or boiled and roasted vegetables. It can also be used as a dip for other fried or roasted snacks. 

Ingredients: Onion, garlic, chilli power, Tamarind paste, fish sauce, sugar, salt, Giant Water bug. No artificial preservatives or colours added.  

Approx. 50g

name: Sago Worm Larvae
description:
Sago Worm Larvae

Sago worm, Larvae of Rhynchophorus Ferrugineus, is considered a delicacy in much of Southeast Asia. 

These worms have been cooked and dehydrated. When eated raw however, 
"Sago Delight" or "Fried Sago Worms" are considered a specialty in Malaysia, although versions of this dish can be found in many Southeast Asian countries. In Papua New Guinea, where it is regarded as a delicacy and roasted on a spit to celebrate special occasions. 

Sago grubs have been described as creamy tasting when raw, and like bacon or meat when cooked. They are often prepared with sago flour. 

They are eaten either raw or roasted, and are regarded as a special high-nutrient meal among most Sarawak tribes such as the Melanau and the Dayak. The Asmat, Korowai and Kombai peoples of southern New Guinea also hold the larva in high regard as a food source.

Directions: Eat whole

approximately 4-5 large dehydrated and seasoned sago worms in each pack, (as seen in picture). 

Please note, these bugs have been through a toasting and seasoning process. Therefore, and due to their delicate nature, they are not perfectly preserved specimens; as seen clearly in product pictures.

A funky addition to any collection. Just because it's clear doesn't mean it's frosty! It's packing 500,000 SHU's of pure cap heat! 148ml

name: World’s Hottest Chilli
description: New – World’s Hottest Chilli !!!! The Bhut Jolokia (A.K.A. Naga Jolokia) was officially measured at over one million Scoville Heat Units (SHU) in 2006 and replaces the Red Savina Habanero (557,000 SHU, measured in 1994) as the current record holder. These chillies are very, very, very hot. We recommend taking precautions when handling them: wear gloves at all times when handling and wear a dust/vapour mask if you are grinding (particularly if you use a pestle and mortar) or rehydrating and reducing to a paste. See our Chilli Handling kit. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with water and seek medical advice. Heat: 10/10 Being three times hotter than an Orange Habanero, our suggestion for cooking with these chillies is to use a small amount, very finely ground (dry or rehydrated and reduced to a paste). As a rough guide, try ¼ of a pod per person for a hot dish.

Suggested Uses: Use sparingly anything you desire! Ingredients: Red and Orange Habaneros, Vinegar, Fresh Cayenne, Smashed Garlic, Chipotle, Pepper Extract, Lime Juice, Cilantro, Fresh Herbs and Spices.) 1 x Blair's Jalapeno Death Sauce (Yum, yum, yum. Pour me all over! A delicious combination of Jalapenos, Tomatillos, Garlic and lots of fresh ingredients topped off with Blue Agave Tequila for that special bite that gives Jalapeno Death Sauce a "South of the Border" punch. Ingredients: Fresh Jalapeno Chilies, Vinegar, Tomatillos, Fresh Garlic, Key Lime Juice, Shallots, Olive Oil, Sea Salt, Cilantro, Cane Sugar, Onions, Tequila, Spices, Xanthan Gum.) 1 x Blair's Sudden Death Sauce. (Blair is never one to be satisfied. Hence, the creation of Sudden Death. When you need to go beyond... Sudden Death will deliver! Suggested Uses: Use a micro drop on your favorite dishes to enhance your taste sensations. Ingredients: Habanero Peppers, Cayenne Peppers, Vinegar, Salt, Honey, Natural Flavor, Corn Starch, Garlic, Lime Juice Concentrate, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Ginseng, Spices.) Also includes 2 of Blair's famous Dangling Skulls. All packaged together in a custom graphic carrying holder. Size: 2 fl. oz. 60 ml each

name: Chilli Handling Kit

name: Creamy Smoked Reindeer Soup
description: Creamy smoked reindeer soup It's cold and it's dark, time to tuck in to a winter warming bowl of Reindeer Soup! This soup is simply delicious! Lets hope it's not Rudolph! name: Sautéed Reindeer
description: A special delicacy...all the way from Lapland. This sautéed reindeer has been deliciously brased, ready to be turned into a superb supper! Lets hope it's not Rudolph! Reindeer meat is an important part of Finnish food tradition, just as beef is to us Brits. It is perhaps the best known traditional meal from Lapland, especially in Finland, Sweden and Norway. A traditional way sees the Sautéed Reindeer served with Sauce hot, together with mashed potatoes, lingonberry jam, pickled beetroots and pickled cucumbers. Mmmmm! ...Or stick with serving it with Brits mashed potatoes and peas, YUM! WAS £14.50 400 g

name: Astronaut Space Food, Ice Cream flavours and Fruits
description: Astronaut food - freeze dried, ready to eat space food! Enjoy your Chocolate chip Ice cream just as the Astronauts do - the freeze-dried way! Astronaut Chocolate Chip Ice cream, as well as other freeze-dried food items, have been aboard space missions since the early Mercury Missions. They continue to be used on NASA missions today. Astronaut Foods are ideal gift items with a great novelty value and are very affordably priced. Great for kids and adults offering an educational and tasty insight into what astronauts eat. How are Astronaut Foods made? Freeze-drying, or lysophilization, removes water from the food by lowering the air pressure to a point where ice shifts from a solid to a gas. The food is placed in a vacuum chamber and frozen until the water crystalizes. The air pressure is lowered, creating a vacuum, forcing air out of the chamber; next heat is applied, vapourising the ice; finally a freezing coil traps the vaporized water. This process continues for hours, resulting in a perfect freeze-dried Astronaut Food. Cookies and Cream Chocolate Chip Ice Cream Mint Chocolate Chip Ice Cream Astronaut Cinnamon Apple Wedges Astronaut Bananas Astronaut Peaches Astronaut Strawberries Astronaut Ice Cream Astronaut Ice Cream Sandwich How does it Look and Taste? Freeze-drying is like suspended animation because it keeps the ice cream sandwich totally intact, but without the water. As you eat the sandwich, your mouth rehydrates the ice cream, restoring it to its original state. Amazingly the ice cream sandwich looks and tastes just like the original. Freeze-dried ice cream sandwiches can be stored for many years without refrigeration as long as you keep them in an airtight, sealed container. Made in the USA

name: Special Delivery Next Day UK (Royal Mail, UK ONLY)
description:
PLEASE NOTE, ORDERS MUST BE RECEIVED BY 10AM, IN ORDER FOR THEM TO PACKED & DISPATCH THAT DAY AND ARRIVE THE FOLLOWING DAY VIA 'SPECIAL DELIVERY'. ORDERS RECEIVED AFTER 10AM WILL BE DISPATCHED THE FOLLOWING DAY! PLEASE READ BELOW: Special Delivery Next Day UK (Royal Mail, UK ONLY) If you need you order in a hurry, add this Special Delivery Next Day UK (Royal Mail) to your cart. This charge is in addition to our standard postal rate automatically calculated at checkout. Please note, Next Day delivery orders must be placed before 10.00am, in order for them to be packed and dispatched in time to reach you the following day.
NO WEEKEND DELIVERY: A special delivery order placed by 10am on a Friday, will be dispatched the same day and arrive the following Monday. Orders placed after 10am on a Friday or over the weekend, will be dispached Monday morning - to arrive Tuesday. No weekend dispatch.
